articles.title: Wealth of Malaysia's 50 richest on Forbes list rebounds after two-year decline - The Edge Markets MY
articles.description: KUALA LUMPUR (June 3): Tycoons on the 2021 Forbes Malaysia Rich List saw a rebound in their collective wealth as it rose 14% to nearly US$90 billion (about RM370.98 billion) this year, after declining for two years, said Forbes Asia.In a statement today, Forb…
